references: N. S. S. Gu, N. Y. Li and T. Mansour, 2-Binary trees: bijections and related issues, Discr. Math., 308 (2008), 1209-1221.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 661
maple: spec := [S,{C = Union(S,B,Z),B = Prod(S,C),S = Prod(C,C)},unlabeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size = n), n = 0..20);
prog: (Maxima) a(n):=if n<2 then 0 else (2*sum(binomial(k,n-k-2)*binomial(n+k-1,n-1),k,0,n-2))/n; [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 19 2012]
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
